bug.author: ryandawsonuk
bug.summary: make build-kfctl-container errors with cannot find module providing package
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/commit/7c0932a117f2f2dc232271992d0348c4747021eb>Latest master </denchmark-link> doesn't build when running from the bootstrap dir. I get: <denchmark-code>#19 23.73 go: extracting github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow v0.6.1 #19 24.99 build github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/v3/cmd/kfctlClient: cannot load github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/bootstrap/app: cannot find module providing package github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/bootstrap/app #19 25.00 make: *** [Makefile:61: fmt] Error 1 ------ executor failed running [/bin/sh -c make build-kfctl]: exit code: 2 make[1]: *** [Makefile:115: build-kfctl-container] Error </denchmark-code>
This was working for me a month or so ago.

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.86. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gabrielwen>@gabrielwen</denchmark-link> seems related to the new kfctlClient code.

Can you try running <denchmark-code>make clean make build </denchmark-code>
I think dependencies might be cached somewhere. Are you doing this on master or v0.6-branch? Can you also check if postsubmits and periodic runs on master are passing? That would help us determine whether its just you or broken for everybody.

I can reproduce on master. <denchmark-code>build github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/v3/cmd/kfctlClient: cannot load github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/bootstrap/app: cannot find module providing package github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/bootstrap/app make: *** [Makefile:61: fmt] Error 1 </denchmark-code>
Test grid isn't showing any results (see <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/testing/issues/438>kubeflow/testing#438</denchmark-link> ) Here are some postsubmit jobs though <denchmark-link:https://prow.k8s.io/?repo=kubeflow%2Fkubeflow&type=postsubmit>https://prow.k8s.io/?repo=kubeflow%2Fkubeflow&type=postsubmit</denchmark-link>

Post submit shows the same failure <denchmark-link:https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/kubeflow_kubeflow/kubeflow-postsubmit/1161075475825561601/>https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/kubeflow_kubeflow/kubeflow-postsubmit/1161075475825561601/</denchmark-link>

My conjecture is the problem is <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3786>#3786</denchmark-link> which changed imports to v3 and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3830>#3830</denchmark-link>
My guess is this wasn't caught in presubmits because <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3830>#3830</denchmark-link> was based on master prior to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/pull/3786>#3786</denchmark-link> being merged.
